title: Correction: Retinal Ganglion Cells Can Rapidly Change Polarity from Off to On
fullText:
In PLoS Biology, volume 5, issue 3: doi: 10.1371/journal.pbio.0050136

Figue 8A was published without a scale bar. The corrected figure is as follows. The legend remains the same.
